channel.title: TITLE!
channel.description: father, grandfather, son, inventor, angel investor, astroNUT, peskaterian, nonsense, RT's are my own. I don't make sense most of the time. Most of what I just said isn't true.

item.title: Using React for the First Time
item.description:
the ransom note

This is simultaneously a test entry for the Blaggerator and a mini-post on reactJS. It is fun. It can do things. It was not difficult to write (but it was REALLY hard to wrap my mind around the core concepts). Most importantly, I didnâ€™t get a headache from it (aside from the very beginning).

Anyway, type below in the text box. Each letter will be randomly generated to the right. I hope to do something more sophisticated with this in a few days.
